item.title: How to make more than just one item..at a time
item.dc:creator: @xdeathxmagex xdeathxmagex
item.description:
@xdeathxmagex wrote:

he ll o use this command for runes:

			else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("runes"))
			{
				addItem(558,1000000);
				addItem(560,1000000);
				addItem(561,1000000);
				addItem(562,1000000);
				addItem(563,1000000);
				addItem(566,1000000);
				addItem(565,1000000);
				addItem(554,1000000);
				addItem(555,1000000);
				addItem(556,1000000);
				addItem(557,1000000);
			}

there ya go its a lot faster then doing ::pickup for each rune!

xdeathxmagex
